title: Relentless Passion
description: A NEW DESIREThe day Logan Ramsey came back to Colville, Colorado, Maggie Colleran felt whole again. She'd known Logan all her life, but lately thoughts of him had invaded her days and nights in a disturbing, different way. Those strong shoulders she'd always leaned on now beckoned for her caress; those lips that never failed to smile for her now begged for her kiss. She finally realized what she should have known all along. And it was time to show Logan that she loved him as a woman should, time to set her desires free.A TREASURED LOVELogan Ramsey had one purpose for coming into town-to set things straight with Maggie. Beautiful, stubborn, elusive Maggie. He had to have her-he would wait no longer. For years he had dreamed of seeing her in his bed, her black curls tumbling across the pillow, her creamy flesh bare and trembling for his touch. Now it would all come true. He could see it in her smoky eyes...that aching, seductive yearning...
author: Thea Devine
